*Free Shipping applies to orders of $50 or more. Minimum purchase required before taxes and after discounts. Orders outside our local delivery area, oversized and special-order items do not qualify. Non-qualifying orders incur a shipping charge based on order size, weight and delivery location (minimum charge of $9.95). Other restrictions apply. See grandandtoy.com/terms or call 1-866-391-8111 for details.
**Offer valid at www.grandandtoy.com. Offer valid while supplies last. No promo code necessary. Excludes tax. Purchse any eligible HP Printer (SY5652304, IM7712CF, TD7844ZP, TD5728XX, SY5916837, IM8898DL, SY5446133, TD8435DB, IM30174Y, SY5446132, TD8436DB, IM30173Y, SY5632145,TD1196ZM, IM5148CF, TD5727XX, SY5916838, IM8897DL, TD5725XX, SY5916835, IM8895DL, SY6353229, IM150FFD, TD1P0705, SY6376492, IM643GGB, TD1U0870, IM5150CF, SY5632148, TD1199ZM, TD1P0048, SY6377008, IM55673T, SY5100841, TD9358BS, TD9719ZO, SY5632516, IM3854CH, SY6353250, IM9897CD, SY5632147, TD1198ZM) and get a free Swingline GBC Bindmate Binding Machine (3381609578-0). Retail Value: $19.68. Limit one free item per order per customer. Void if copied, sold, purchased, transferred, taxed or where prohibited. Cannot be combined with any other coupon, associate discount, or any other offers. Offer is not valid on prior purchases or for credit. No cash or credit back. Open to Canadian residents only.
